body.name: MEKO 3 in 1 Stylus Pens for Touch Screens, High Sensitivity & Precision Capacitive Stylus Pencil for Apple iPad iPhone Tablets Samsung Galaxy All Universal Touchscreen Devices (2 Pack-Black/Rose Gold)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 3 mins
features: 【2023 Upgraded 3-in-1 Stylus】: Building on the foundation of dual rubber tips, this new version adds a more precise and sensitive transparent disc tip, and comes with a protective cap. This 3-in-1 stylus pen meets various needs in your daily life, whether it's clicking icons, writing, drawing, or playing games, it can handle them all with ease.

【Highly Sensitive and Accurate】: The disc tip is transparent which allows visibility of the contact point, making it highly accurate and responsive. 180° flexible writing angle for comfortable using. You can get more smooth writing or painting experience, no lag, no interruption, no screen scratching.

【Dual-sized Rubber Tips】: The two different-sized rubber tips(0.18'' & 0.27'') are smooth and responsive, made from high-quality silicone material with excellent wear and aging resistance. The soft rubber tips won't scratch screens or leave as many fingerprints as fingers. Ideal for those with long nails or larger fingers, perfect for browsing screens, writing, note-taking, and playing games.

【Wide Compatibility】: MEKO styluses are universally compatible with all capacitive cell phones, tablets, touch screen laptops & PC, e-Reders, such as Apple iPad/ iPhone/ iPod/ Tablet/ Galaxy/ kindle & more.

【Easy to Use & Replaceable】: No battery or bluetooth needed, simply unscrew the pen cap to use the disc tip and use dual rubber tips directly.All 3 tips are replaceable and finish the replacement process within seconds. Package contains 2* stylus, 4* 0.18'' replacing rubber tips, 4* 0.27'' replaceable rubber tips, 2* disc tips, effectively extending the lifetime of the stylus. To find extra replacement Disc tips, please search ASIN: B016X4QJWE on Amazon.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page No lag, no interruption, no screen scratching Gives you supreme accuracy with the visibility of the contact point Fits flexibly on the screen for different writing angles Next page 1 Precise & Smooth 2 Transparent Design 3 Flexible Writing Angle

Previous page 0.18‘’ and 0.27‘’ rubber tips meet your daily needs. The smallest tips on the marketplace, perfect for clicking small icon or fine work. Smooth and responsive, prefect for writing, drawing and playing games Easy to use and won't scratch screens or leave as many fingerprints as fingers. Next page 1 Double-sized Rubber Tips 2 0.18'' Rubber Tip 3 0.27'' Rubber Tip 4 User Friendly

IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS: Due to the material of the disc is conductive hard plastic, before using the stylus on your device, please make sure both the device screen and the disc are clean, dirt can catch onto the disc which may result in reduced sensitivity, and in some cases may even scratch your screen.Normally our stylus won't cause scratches on the touch screen, but we still suggest you to use a screen protector on your device to protect the screen from any possible damage/scratches which may be caused by dirt on disc/screen, damaged tips or defective products of low probability.If you suspect that your disc has been damaged in any way, discontinue use. A damaged disc may scratch the screen. Please replace it with a new disc.DO NOT remove the plastic disc at the end of the tip, or the tip won't work. Although it looks weird, that’s exactly the part of the tip to conduct and receive a signal from the screens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stylus is easy to write with and has a nice feel on your hand. I use the finest point and so far it has worked perfectly.Great price. Sleek look too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work well when fingers won't!
reviews.reviewText: These stylus pens are accurate and work well, with multiple tip options. A nice thin design that fits well in my hand. I use these as a backup pointing device on my iPhone Pro Max when band-aides get in the way. Cold dry winters cause my thumbs and index fingers to crack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: The MEKO 3-in-1 Stylus Pen for Touch Screens is an incredible find that won't break the bank. Despite being a fraction of the price of other stylus pens, it performs exceptionally well. The high sensitivity makes navigating touch screens effortless, and the 3-in-1 design adds versatility for various tasks. Whether I'm sketching, taking notes, or just navigating my device, this stylus consistently delivers reliable performance. It's a budget-friendly gem that proves you don't need to compromise quality for affordability. I highly recommend the MEKO 3-in-1 Stylus for anyone seeking an effective and cost-efficient stylus solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A nice and sturdy pen. It is thick, which I like because I have big hand and don't like the thin and flimsy stylus pens. It works perfectly to edit videos and photos, and even write notes with ease on the android phone I have. However, the material is very smooth, making it extremely easy to drop. I would have liked for it have a clip on it, like real pens have, so I can slip it into a pocket or bag and not loose place of it. Having said that, the experience with it is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work nicely.
reviews.reviewText: Nice touch pens that work as described. Plus, you get a bag of replacement tips to change out when needed. Now, if I can just remember where I put that little bag when I need them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't find aa single thing I don't like about these. The weight makes these feel nice in the hand and with a more relaxed grip than others that are lighter. The precision and options are fabulous for texting gaming. Rubber tips seem more durable as well and a bit more stiff allowing a better experience. Like them so much I repurchased so have them available in car, purse, wherever I might use and have backups :-) very happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: good size and the tips work great. feels well made. My only issue is I wish there was some sort of texture on the barrel of the pen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Incredible value for the product. My kids have been asking for a stylus pen for a while now and I was hesitant to spend a lot of money on one because they are 9 and 11. When I came across this one, I thought I'd give it a try. It doesn't disappoint, not only did I get two but I love that it came with extra tips for when these get worn out. Works on iphone, ipads, computers. I loved it so much I ordered a set for myself and then ordered another set to give as a gift. Highly recommended!
